benchmark_details.name: RepoBugs
benchmark_details.overview: RepoBugs is a new benchmark comprising 124 typical repository-level bugs from open-source repositories designed specifically for evaluating repository-level automatic program repair tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the performance of LLMs on repository-level automatic program repair tasks.

data.source: Crawled open-source Python repositories from GitHub, manually crafted by experts.

methodology.calculation: Manual evaluation of repair success based on criteria.
methodology.interpretation: High repair rates indicate effective context extraction and model performance.
methodology.baseline_results: Repair rate of preliminary method for GPT-3.5 was 22.58%.
methodology.validation: Evaluation results provided by experts with programming experience.
